testsuite.name: features.workitems.contents.Test Contents of the Workitems Page

testcase.classname: features.workitems.contents.Test Contents of the Workitems Page
testcase.name: ACME Workitems Page displays page title
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario: ACME Workitems Page displays page title Given I am on the Workitems Page ... passed in 63.403s Then There is a title shown on the page ... passed in 0.060s And The title tag contains "Work Items" ... passed in 0.064s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------

testcase.classname: features.workitems.contents.Test Contents of the Workitems Page
testcase.name: Workitems page displays navigation bar
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario: Workitems page displays navigation bar Given I am on the Workitems Page ... passed in 23.892s Then The navigation bar header "ACME System 1" is displayed ... passed in 0.136s And The navigation link "Home" is displayed ... passed in 0.186s And The navigation link "Log Out" is displayed ... passed in 0.119s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------

testcase.classname: features.workitems.contents.Test Contents of the Workitems Page
testcase.name: Workitems page displays breadcrumbs
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario: Workitems page displays breadcrumbs Given I am on the Workitems Page ... passed in 42.776s Then The breadcrumb "Home" is displayed ... passed in 0.195s And The breadcrumb "Work Items" is displayed ... passed in 0.098s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------

testcase.classname: features.workitems.contents.Test Contents of the Workitems Page
testcase.name: Workitems page displays footer
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario: Workitems page displays footer Given I am on the Workitems Page ... passed in 50.205s Then There is a footer shown on the page ... passed in 0.042s And The text displayed is "Copyright Â© 2020 ACME Systems" ... passed in 0.073s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------

testcase.classname: features.workitems.contents.Test Contents of the Workitems Page
testcase.name: Workitems page displays Work Items Panel
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario: Workitems page displays Work Items Panel Given I am on the Workitems Page ... passed in 44.182s Then The panel header displays "Search Results" ... passed in 0.138s And The panel text displays "Please find below your work items. They need to be completed in the order specified by your manager." ... passed in 0.123s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------

testcase.classname: features.workitems.contents.Test Contents of the Workitems Page
testcase.name: Workitems page displays Work Items Table
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario: Workitems page displays Work Items Table Given I am on the Workitems Page ... passed in 52.759s Then The table displays row headers ... passed in 0.281s And The table displays max of 10 rows ... passed in 0.089s And Each row contains "search" icon ... passed in 0.062s And Each row contains "trash" icon ... passed in 0.061s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------

testcase.classname: features.workitems.contents.Test Contents of the Workitems Page
testcase.name: Workitems page displays page numbers
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario: Workitems page displays page numbers Given I am on the Workitems Page ... passed in 53.740s Then The page numbers are displayed ... passed in 0.047s And "1" page number is "displayed" and "not enabled" ... passed in 0.103s And ">" page number is "displayed" and "enabled" ... passed in 0.089s And "<" page number is "not displayed" and "not enabled" ... passed in 0.035s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------

testcase.classname: features.workitems.contents.Test Contents of the Workitems Page
testcase.name: Work items from DB are all displayed
